lines:
Columbia Universtin

New York

907

dup 
Dew Dot New Yook Aty

Jan B.191 
My dear m. Stars

I hank you caso 
much for your Kindness in Helping me

Your letter wito o inclosed check 
for $3504 $10. have just been 
recind and I am returns here 
wits receipt for in two

to leana 
New Yook aty u ino 6

the

of the 
monto a schedule ondie a 
to 130, of Jan. from Seattle

Gadbye Mr Steams, le ell 
Qee gaura in rome near future 
Time in Amrisa ez abroad

quer Sensene find

pe Luk

. Am

going to
raw: Columbia Universtin New York 907 dup Dew Dot New Yook Aty Jan B.191 My dear m. Stars I hank you caso much for your Kindness in Helping me Your letter wito o inclosed check for $3504 $10. have just been recind and I am returns here wits receipt for in two to leana New Yook aty u ino 6 the of the monto a schedule ondie a to 130, of Jan. from Seattle Gadbye Mr Steams, le ell Qee gaura in rome near future Time in Amrisa ez abroad quer Sensene find pe Luk . Am going to

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter to Alfred Stearns from S.C. Luk with thanks for Stearns' help and the checks of $350 and $10. He states he will leave New York on January 6th and expresses his desire to see Stearns in the future.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
